name: Free php rapidshare search engine bot.

screenshots.caption: Free php rapidshare file search engine bot.

short_description: It’s a completely automatic download niche (software, games, movies, tv shows, mp3 musics etc) search engine cum auto blogging script which can simultaneously list files like a search engine and generate files description like a pro blogger 24X7 for free, very easy to install and very light weight. It doesn’t require database support and uses disk base file system to store and cache everything. It has built in four ads module to monetize your site. Ppc ads module in search results pages (left, right, top, bottom) and file description pages (top), cpa content locker support in final download page (pay per download module). Also intext ads and Google analytics module and Full featured back end admin panel available
summary: Free php rapidshare, mediafire, hotfile search engine bot script.
